attributes.action: Parent and child parking spaces should have a badge to park in them
attributes.additional_details: These spaces are designed to be able to fully open your doors to get your child out and not damage other peoples cars.
attributes.background: Im tired of going to shops with my children and not being able to park in a parent and child space because someone without children has decided they are to important to follow a rule. These people wouldnt do the same in a disabled bay so why do it in a parent and child bay?
